医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
英国帕金森氏症患者将在 2024 年通过增加体育活动补助金来支持积极生活英国帕金森氏症协会正在提供颇受欢迎的体育活动补助计划，以帮助更多帕金森氏症患者在 2024 年开始锻炼身体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Parkinsone28099s-UK-supports-active-living-with-enhanced-Physical-Activity-Grants-in-2024.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Parkinsone28099s-UK-supports-active-living-with-enhanced-Physical-Activity-Grants-in-2024.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a99bcbaf-8e7c-4de5-af4a-425e0a6be74d Mon, 05 Aug 2024 02:16:00 -0400 Parkinson’s UK supports active living with enhanced Physical Activity Grants in 2024
突破性设备彻底改变了物理治疗师的盆底训练盆底问题，如失禁、脱垂、上厕所困难和性交疼痛等都很常见，通常最好的治疗方法是理疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Groundwriting-device-revolutionizes-pelvic-floor-training-for-physicaltherapys.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Groundwriting-device-revolutionizes-pelvic-floor-training-for-physicaltherapys.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7f44ec20-bf23-4a10-a9b3-4fdb7cfec37c Mon, 05 Aug 2024 02:14:00 -0400 Groundbreaking device revolutionizes pelvic floor training for physiotherapists
FDA 批准 AChEI ALPHA-1062 用于治疗阿尔茨海默病2024年7月29日，美国FDA批准了Alpha Cognition Inc.的ALPHA-1062 (Zunveyl®)，一种乙酰胆碱酯酶(AChE)抑制剂，用于治疗轻至中度阿尔茨海默病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/FDA-approves-AChEI-ALPHA-1062-for-alzheimere28099s-disease-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/FDA-approves-AChEI-ALPHA-1062-for-alzheimere28099s-disease-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08ef16cb-4826-48c9-a488-835436c32f9e Mon, 05 Aug 2024 01:16:00 -0400 FDA approves AChEI ALPHA-1062 for Alzheimer’s disease treatment
FDA 接受 PD-L1 抑制剂 durvalumab 用于治疗子宫内膜癌2024年6月14日，美国FDA批准阿斯利康的Durvalumab（IMFINZI®）用于治疗错配修复缺陷的原发性晚期或复发性子宫内膜癌。子宫内膜癌是最常见的妇科癌症，预计 2023 年美国将新增 66,200 例子宫内膜癌病例。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/FDA-accepted-PD-L1-inhibitor-durvalumab-for-the-treatment-of-endometrial-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/FDA-accepted-PD-L1-inhibitor-durvalumab-for-the-treatment-of-endometrial-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ee54b75d-106e-4bba-a972-c34e87ff8803 Mon, 05 Aug 2024 01:05:00 -0400 FDA accepted PD-L1 inhibitor durvalumab for the treatment of endometrial cancer
研究表明胆固醇失衡与神经退行性变有关潜在的干预策略研究强调了大脑中胆固醇失衡如何导致阿尔茨海默氏症、亨廷顿氏症和帕金森氏症等神经退行性疾病，并提出了有针对性的治疗干预措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Cholesterol-imbalance-linked-to-neurodegenesis-study-suggests-potential-strategies-for-intervention.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240805/Cholesterol-imbalance-linked-to-neurodegenesis-study-suggests-potential-strategies-for-intervention.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f339ea06-7c91-418b-a4ea-cf1be0c758d7 Mon, 05 Aug 2024 00:23:00 -0400 Cholesterol imbalance linked to neurodegeneration, study suggests potential strategies for intervention
迷幻药的阴暗面：新模型揭示了错误见解和信念的风险研究人员引入 FIBUS 模型来解释迷幻药如何导致错误的见解和信念，强调需要进行仔细的临床评估以优化治疗结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240804/Psychedelics-dark-side-New-model-reveals-risks-of-false-insights-and-beliefs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240804/Psychedelics-dark-side-New-model-reveals-risks-of-false-insights-and-beliefs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9e03cd82-25a9-4d5e-a046-aab46945bc3e Sun, 04 Aug 2024 23:47:00 -0400 Psychedelics' dark side: New model reveals risks of false insights and beliefs
糖尿病会使严重的长期疾病的发作加速 15-20 年，从而缩短预期寿命《自然医学》杂志上的一项研究表明，糖尿病会使多种长期疾病的发病加速 15-20 年，从而显着缩短英国成年人的预期寿命。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240804/Diabetes-accelerates-the-onset-of-severe-long-term-conditions-by-15-20-years-cutting-life-expectancy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240804/Diabetes-accelerates-the-onset-of-severe-long-term-conditions-by-15-20-years-cutting-life-expectancy.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1f90df69-6bf8-49f5-9ca3-73fe56888dfa Sun, 04 Aug 2024 23:27:00 -0400 Diabetes accelerates the onset of severe long-term conditions by 15-20 years, cutting life expectancy
年轻一代癌症发病率上升表明迫切需要早期预防策略《柳叶刀公共卫生》的一项研究显示，美国年轻出生群体的癌症发病率和死亡率不断上升，表明生命早期致癌物质暴露的增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240804/Rising-cancer-rates-in-younger- Generations-signal-urgent-need-for-early-life-prevention-strategies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240804/Rising-cancer-rates-in-younger- Generations-signal-urgent-need-for-early-life-prevention-strategies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=31bf2512-ea8c-4870-ac55-73743b4e842d Sun, 04 Aug 2024 23:02:00 -0400 Rising cancer rates in younger generations signal urgent need for early-life prevention strategies
德克萨斯州奶牛和牛奶中发现 H5N1 禽流感，引发对感染漏报的担忧UTMB 的研究人员在德克萨斯州的奶牛和牛奶中发现了 H5N1 禽流感病毒，这凸显了农场工人感染情况可能存在漏报的情况，以及加强监测的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240804/H5N1-avian-flu-found-in-Texas-dairy-cattle-and-milk-sparking-concerns-about-underreported-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240804/H5N1-avian-flu-found-in-Texas-dairy-cattle-and-milk-sparking-concerns-about-underreported-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f15cdbc5-7410-492a-b0a3-c43b1c21d94d Sun, 04 Aug 2024 22:34:00 -0400 H5N1 avian flu found in Texas dairy cattle and milk, sparking concerns about underreported infections
在大脑的颅骨骨髓中发现活性免疫细胞对抗胶质母细胞瘤一项研究揭示了胶质母细胞瘤中免疫细胞的存在和活性，揭示了对脑肿瘤免疫学和潜在治疗途径的新见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240804/Active-immune-cells-discovered-in-brains-cranial-bone-marrow-fighting-glioblastomas.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240804/Active-immune-cells-discovered-in-brains-cranial-bone-marrow-fighting-glioblastomas.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a205bf10-ff9d-4a2e-9cd1-cf53da3d9df2 Sun, 04 Aug 2024 22:11:00 -0400 Active immune cells discovered in brain's cranial bone marrow fighting glioblastomas
